name: L3HARRIS CHESAPEAKE SCIENCES CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: The FY19 Navy budget request and congressional legislative actions, specifically focusing on current and future authorizations and appropriations in the areas of Navy Procurement related to Acoustic T
Monitoring both the FY19 DoD and Navy Budgets. Emphasis on current and future DoN RDT&E and Procurement funding levels for submarine towed arrays.
